The entities "POBDTPD" and "PC 70 BM" are both referring to material properties in the paragraph. "POBDTPD" stands for "Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (PEDOT) blend film" and "PC 70 BM" stands for "Polycarbonate (PC) with a weight average molecular weight of 70,000 g/mol blend film".
